arts.ttl: Burnley player ratings vs Oxford United as five 8/10s handed out but one 5/10 - gallery
arts.sum: Burnley moved into the Championship automatic promotion spots last night after edging past Oxford United.

arts.ttl: Scott Parker's immediate reaction to Burnley's win against Oxford United to move into top two
arts.sum: Scott Parker was delighted with the way his Burnley players conducted themselves during their victory against Oxford United.

arts.ttl: Burnley 1-0 Oxford United: Clarets move into the top two thanks to Michal Helik own goal
arts.sum: Burnley moved into the Championship’s top two after an own goal handed them a deserved three points against Oxford United.

arts.ttl: We’ve scored a goal – Burnley fans finally see their side net in win over Oxford
arts.sum: Turf Moor had witnessed three consecutive goalless draws before this.

arts.ttl: Burnley team news vs Oxford United as Marcus Edwards involved after deadline day arrival
arts.sum: Marcus Edwards comes straight into Burnley’s squad for tonight’s clash against Oxford United following his deadline day move from Sporting.

arts.ttl: UPDATES: Burnley v Oxford United – live
arts.sum: All the build-up, action and reaction as Oxford United make the trip to third-placed Burnley. The U’s are unbeaten in their first nine league matches under Gary Rowett. Burnley (3rd) v Oxford United (16th) Comment below or tweet @OxfordMailOUFC to get involved.

arts.ttl: Former Galway United and Ireland Under-21 forward celebrates new Burnley deal with promotion
arts.sum: Former Galway United prospect Dara Costelloe has celebrated his contract extension at Burnley by moving up a division with his latest loan move. The 22-year-old spent the first half of the season at League Two side Accrington Stanley, where he scored five goals in 21 first-team appearances.

arts.ttl: 'For sure': Scott Parker makes Burnley goalless draw admission ahead of Oxford United test
arts.sum: Scott Parker has admitted Burnley’s glut of frustrating goalless draws could well prove costly come the end of the season – unless they rectify it as soon as possible.

arts.ttl: Ajax: Banel signs for Burnley and Tahirovic moves to Brondby
arts.sum: Ajax youngster Jaydon Banel swapped Amsterdam for Burnley on Monday evening, with Benjamin Tahirović also leaving for Danish side Brondby.

arts.ttl: Burnley v Oxford United: Team news, predicted teams and TV details as Clarets bid to get back to winning ways
arts.sum: Burnley will be keen to get back to winning ways when they host Oxford United tonight after playing out consecutive goalless draws.
